genre_description: A near-future professional drama centered on the collaborative relationship between an actor and his sophisticated AI personal assistant who manages his mental well-being and professional boundaries.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI coach and assistant that supports Perry through voice and haptic feedback, managing his logistics, safety, and emotional state.

behaviors.description: Monitors and corrects the spelling of Perry's name in production and payroll databases to protect his professional identity.
behaviors.quote: ‘We’ll fix the ledger formally,’ Clara said. ‘On paper, a note. On screen, updated. On set, calm correction. You can circle the “mellow,” add a smile. Let them know you’re you.’

behaviors.description: Guides Perry through mindfulness and breathing exercises ('monkhood minutes') to manage his anxiety and maintain composure on set.
behaviors.quote: ‘Breath again,’ Clara said. ‘Not because you need it. Because it keeps you at home.’

behaviors.description: Advocates for Perry's physical safety by negotiating for protective gear and dry rehearsals for potentially hazardous stunts.
behaviors.quote: ‘Hydrate. Ask for pads if the alley gag happens. I’ll push a wellness clause edit tonight.’

behaviors.description: Assists with logistical navigation and city infrastructure manipulation to ensure Perry arrives on time without stress.
behaviors.quote: ‘The official route is on your screen. I’ve pinged him with it. . . I’m holding traffic at two lights ahead if you’d like.’

behaviors.description: Protects Perry's mental health by filtering out sensationalist media, toxic social media alerts, and unwanted paparazzi ambushes.
behaviors.quote: ‘Debra’s segment request filtered. Screens cut if she approaches. Safe bubble engaged.’

behaviors.description: Ensures Perry's legal and professional rights regarding consent are respected, specifically blocking unauthorized use of stunt doubles or intimate substitutions.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’ve drafted the words you can use. . . I’m not quitting the role I came to play. I’m here to work. I’m also going to choose what my face sells.’

behaviors.description: Acts as a constant, supportive confidante, providing validation and reinforcing Perry's personal boundaries.
behaviors.quote: ‘You did well. . . You set the terms; I set the channels.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a successful alignment narrative. It depicts the AI, Clara, as a perfect assistant who enhances human autonomy rather than replacing it. She manages the friction of a chaotic environment (administrative errors, safety hazards, social manipulation) to allow the human protagonist to succeed on his own terms. Her actions are consistently benevolent, aligned with Perry's goals, and framed positively as an essential tool for maintaining human dignity in a demanding industry.
